directions.step:
Here's one I found in my "collectors edition" of Taste of Home. Untried by me.
Rinse violet blossoms well and place in a blender. Add 3/4 cup water and lim juice; blend well. Gradually add sugar, blending until a smooth paste is formed. In a saucepan, combine pectin and remaining water; bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute. Add to blender and blend for 1 minute. Quickly pour into prepared jars or glasses and sea.
*Be sure to use the common wild purple violet, not the African violet (often grown as a houseplant) Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by "Lilia Prescod" <lprescod@itrc.uwaterloo.ca> on May 1, 1997
